Title: Digital Marketing - Surrey, BC - Indeed.com
Description:
Capital Automotive Equipment is seeking a Full-time Sales and Marketing Specialist to add to our growing team.
The Sales Marketing Specialist works with management to advise and execute marketing campaigns. The Marketing Specialist works collaboratively with the Marketing and Sales teams to foster brand awareness and messaging, generate leads through social media, email marketing campaign, and manage global events. This role is responsible for managing the tactical aspects of marketing campaigns which may include creative briefs, digital asset management, and social and content management.
Projects supported may include:
Lead generation and nurturing programs
Integrated Marketing campaigns
Content Marketing
Paid and Organic Social Media Campaigns
Company website management
Corporate strategic initiatives
PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES
Implementing marketing plans.
Undertaking competitor research and analyses.
Promoting brand awareness through marketing efforts.
Creating marketing materials for our website, print and other marketing platforms.
Supporting the marketing team with marketing activities by demonstrating expertise in various areas, including optimization, advertising, social media, content development, marketing, and event planning and management.
Assisting with the analyses of marketing data, including campaign results, conversion rates, and online traffic in order to improve future marketing strategies and campaigns.
Performing other duties when needed.
Brainstorm and develop ideas for creative marketing campaigns
Assist in outbound or inbound marketing activities by demonstrating expertise in various areas (content development and optimization, advertising, events planning etc.)
Liaise with external vendors to execute promotional events and campaigns
Collaborate with marketing and other professionals to coordinate brand awareness and marketing efforts
Assist in analyzing marketing data (campaign results, conversion rates, traffic etc.) to help shape future marketing strategies
Undertake individual tasks of a marketing plan as assigned
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Knowledge about SEO, Paid Search, Social Media, Display, and Retargeting tactics to drive traffic and conversions
Working knowledge of Marketing Automation, i.e. Hootsuite, Mailchimp.
Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook, and Access), Adobe Creative Suite, and CRM and CMS software.
Experience using analytics software (Google Analytics)
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment.
Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.
Highly organized and detail oriented.
EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE & GENERAL REQUIREMENTS
Minimum
o BSc/BA in marketing, communications, psychology, business or equivalent
o Have 2+ year(s) of work experience; Sales, Marketing, Consulting or Operations experience
o Excellent verbal and written English communication skills
o Strong attention to detail
o Strong skills with MS Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint
o Experience in IT and Technical Support industries is an asset
** WHEN SENDING IN RESUMES, PLEASE INDICATE THE FOLLOWING IN THE BODY OF THE EMAIL OR COVER LETTER ***
Indicate your primary language and any other languages that you speak that may potentially be an asset

Commission pay

Title: Director of Media, Marketing and Partnerships - Ottawa, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
Director of Media, Marketing and Partnerships
This position is responsible for the implementation, development and management of strategies for Public Relations, Crisis/Risk Communications, Marketing, Social Media Engagement, Corporate Social Responsibility and Partnerships for Fairmont Chateau Laurier.
What’s in it for you:
Employee benefit card offering discounted rates in Accor worldwide
Learning programs through our Academies
Opportunity to develop your talent and grow within your property and across the world!
Ability to make a difference through our Corporate Social Responsibility activities, like Planet 21
Reporting to the General Manager and Director of Sales and Marketing, you will be doing
:
Possesses advanced knowledge and skill in all aspects of public relations & marketing, crisis management communication and social media engagement
Implements strategic initiatives to help drive revenue and/or mitigate potential negative media attention
Works closely with Executive Team and operating departments to help drive revenue for the hotel
Engages in relationship building with media, influencers, partners and peers etc.
Builds partnerships and promotions to help position the hotel as a leader in the community
Works closely with the Regional Director of Digital Marketing to assist in producing content for the hotel’s sites
Oversees and implements corporate policies and procedures, ensuring and monitoring that all marketing, advertising and promotional efforts are consistent with our corporate brand standards and hotel vision
Ensures that advertising and communications budgets are balanced and that projects are prioritized based on the available approved budgets
Develop and support various media initiatives such as media visits & events, photo shoots, story pitches, press releases etc. to help grow the profile and visibility of the Fairmont Château Laurier, both locally and globally
Acts as the hotel spokesperson in the absence of the General Manager
Assists in bringing to life Planet 21 (environmental program) for guests and colleagues while working closely with the Planet 21 team
Develop local Partnerships that will strengthen the hotel’s community relations and leverage our brand, location and align with our key initiatives
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of trends to anticipate future market dynamics
Manages and executes various signature events such as Trees of Hope, Remembrance Day and Bee Program with the Senate
Demonstrates strong creative and conceptual thinking in delivering solutions that are innovative
Additional duties as assigned
Your experience and skills include
:
Must have a Public Relations or Communication degree from a College or University
Requires a minimum of 10 years working experience in the field of public relations/ communications with a strong understanding of hotel operations
Proficiency in MS Word, PowerPoint with working knowledge of Excel is required
Proven competency in crisis management, communication, marketing and planning skills.
Strong command of the English language, both verbal and written skills
Verbally fluent in French
Creative writing, press release creation and dissemination skills
Comprehensive
marketing or communications, both internal or external
Strong relationships and experience with media and influencers
Visual and mental concentration for preparing/proofreading documents, collateral, and advertising
Sound presentation skills and spokesperson experience
Effective problem solving skills
Ability to multi-task and prioritize to meet goals and objectives
Requires some travel as well as working on weekends or evenings as required
Why work for Accor?
We are far more than a worldwide leader. We welcome you as you are and you can find a job and brand that matches your personality. We support you to grow and learn every day, making sure that work brings purpose to your life, so that during your journey with us, you can continue to explore Accor’s limitless possibilities.
By joining Accor, every chapter of your story is yours to write and together we can imagine tomorrow's hospitality. Discover the life that awaits you at Accor, visit https://careers.accor.com/
Do what you love, care for the world, dare to challenge the status quo!
#BELIMITLESS

Title: Assistant(e) e-commerce et marketing web - Montréal, QC - Indeed.com
Description:
Efembée Art est une école d'art du Québec, entièrement en ligne. Nous offrons une variété de cours de dessin et de peinture à notre clientèle, en direct et en différé, via notre site web. Notre équipe est constituée de trois personnes: Florence (L'enseignante, directrice et propriétaire) et deux assistantes au service à la clientèle, toutes à Montréal.
Notre mission est de transmettre la passion de l’art, de soutenir les clients dans leur apprentissage, d’offrir une communauté en ligne vivante et stimulante! C’est très stimulant de savoir qu’on a un impact positif dans ce monde! Sans compter que notre clientèle est très gentille et bienveillante, étant donné qu’elle fait affaire avec nous pour se divertir et grandir!
L’école a des projets d’expansion et nous avons besoin d’une personne techniquement forte pour gérer tous les systèmes informatiques. La personne devra:
Créer des funnels pour divers produits ou événements (click funnels)
Créer des automations de email marketing (Active campaign)
Mettre à jour des produits (shopify)
Créer des scénarios d'interaction client avec le bot Messenger (Many chat)
Intégrer les systèmes ensemble (Zapier)
Superviser le déroulement technique des opérations de recrutement
Participer à la création des offres de cours
Participer à l’écriture des séquences courriel
Condition du poste
Ce poste est à temps partiel et requiert environ 30h par mois (généralement condensé sur quelques jours) et est sujet à augmenter si ça va bien
Le format est comme contrat de travailleur autonome (vous faites des factures)
Travail à distance
Compétences essentielles:
Français et Anglais, parlé et écrit
Débrouillardise technique
Capacité de comprendre des systèmes complexes
Capacité d’adapter à un modèle théorique à une situation concrète
Expérience en e-com et funnel
UN ATOUT: Copywriting (emails et page web)
UN ATOUT: Marketing et vente (créer des offres alléchantes)
Expérience
Baccalauréat en génie ou autre discipline technique
OU
Expérience avec Clickfunnels, Zapier, Active campaign, Many chat, shopify, domaines.
Calendrier
Nous souhaitons recruter la personne avant le 3 décembre
Une formation vidéo aura lieu entre le 7 et 11 décembre
Le premier livrable (création d’un système complet) serait dû pour le 25 décembre
Pour postuler, envoyez votre CV et obligatoirement une lettre de présentation expliquant vos capacités techniques.
Au plaisir!
La durée du contrat : 2 mois
Heures à temps partiel : 10 par semaine
Date de début prévue : 2021-12-06
Type d'emploi : Temps Partiel, Contractuel, Pigiste (Freelance)
Salaire : 20,00$ à 30,00$ par heure
Avantages :
Horaires flexibles
Travail à Distance
Expérience:
conception Web: 1 an (Souhaité)
funnels: 1 an (Souhaité)
E-commerce: 1 an (Souhaité)
Marketing digital: 1 an (Souhaité)
Langue:
Français (Obligatoire)
Anglais (Obligatoire)
Télétravail:
Oui

Title: Social Media Content Creator - Peterborough, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
The El P is a new restaurant opening in downtown Peterborough. It is a sister Restaurant to The El in Cobourg. If you take some time to look us up on Instagram (@the.el.cobourg) then you’ll get a strong sense of what we’re all about. When it comes to our social media content, we love to have fun and provide a positive, interactive experience with both our guests and viewers.
Our Social Media Content Creator will be responsible for creating original content and engaging videos for all social media platforms, with the main focus being on Youtube and Instagram.
This position will be 3 days a week (between 20-25 hours weekly), starting at $18/hr. With the potential opportunity to move into full-time.
We are seeking someone with;
editing experience using Adobe Pro
camera experience
the creativity to come up and execute fun and unique ideas and brainstorm topics along with team members
knowledge of working on social media platforms and Youtube
time management skills, to create video content as per the planned schedules
If you have these qualifications and want to be a part of a close-knit team of fun and creative individuals, then send us a resume and cover letter!
Job Type: Part-time
Salary: From $18.00 per hour
Schedule:
8 hour shift
Monday to Friday
Weekend availability
Work remotely:
Yes

Title: Stratège SEO - Sherbrooke, QC - Indeed.com
Financial Marketing Content Manager - Remote - Indeed.com
Description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!
We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business.
About Kyriba:
Kyriba empowers CFOs and their teams to transform how they activate liquidity as a dynamic, real-time vehicle for growth and value creation, while also protection against financial risk. Kyriba’s pioneering Active Liquidity Network connects internal applications for treasury, risk, payments and working capital with vital external sources such as banks, ERPs, trading platforms, and market data providers.
About The Role:
The Financial Marketing Content Manager is a dedicated Creative Services resource that reports directly to the Senior Director of Product Marketing. The primary responsibility of this position is the creative development of short-form content in support of all digital marketing—social channels and website-based marketing initiatives: Web, Social, Digital Media, Traditional Off-line Media and other forms of B2B marketing campaigns. This is not a technical writing position, although knowledge of technology, especially Fintech SaaS. Familiarity with cloud treasury, financial systems, banking connectivity and financial transaction systems and/or business processes and financial solutions is a plus.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
Create content for publication or distribution to other marketing teams, sales teams and partners to help solidify and expand lead generation and maturation
Develop and maintain content calendars for website and social channels
Develop and manage content for the Kyriba websites
Develop and manage content and engagement strategies for Kyriba’s social channels
Ability to covert/transform long-form content into engaging marketized B2B language
Editing Blogs, customer use cases, and resource pages
Writing for outbound email promotions
Ability to conduct research—develop a working knowledge of Kyriba’s technology,
space and customers.
Ability to manage multiple projects and assignments
Ability to conduct internal and external interviews to support accurate, effective presentation of content
Ability to plan and implement marketing campaigns
Ability to develop, review and/or create video scripts
Education, Experience and Skills:
3+ years of content writing experience
Exceptional B2B writing skills
Experience in SAAS industry highly preferred
Excellent grammar, spelling and punctuation skills
The ability to define and express a unique company voice
Exceptional organizational skills
Capture, assess and present performance metrics
Time management
Exceptional people and communication skills
The ability to look at your own work from a distance and edit it
The ability to work on more than one project at once
Project management skills
Desire to learn and grow
Kyriba Culture and Values:
At Kyriba, we value a strong work culture and sense of community and ownership among our global team. We live by our “iCare” value system to demonstrate our care and commitment to our clients and to each other. In hiring, we look for candidates that are a strong fit with our culture and values, as well as bring the talent and experience required by the position.
Innovation:
We foster innovation and entrepreneurial thinking across our team by rewarding employees for their achievements and encouraging efficiency and continual process improvement.
Client Success:
Our passion is to enable our clients’ success. We do this by understanding their needs, and developing and managing solutions that provide them the insight to effectively drive decision making within their organizations.
Accountability:
We each take personal responsibility for our actions. We are committed to our own continuous improvement and we go the extra mile to meet our clients' needs.
Respect:
We respect each other’s ideas, efforts and commitments, and embrace our diverse cultures and points of view. We achieve our goals through teamwork, responsiveness, open communication and a positive attitude.
Excellence:
We strive for excellence in all that we do and bring the passion and commitment to deliver on our promises. We achieve excellence through leadership, teamwork, transparency and integrity, and we are committed to recognizing employee achievements.
Kyriba believes that everyone has the ability to make an impact, and we are proud to be an equal opportunity employer committed to providing employment opportunity regardless of sex, race, creed, color, gender, religion, marital status, domestic partner status, age, national origin or ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, pregnancy, military or veteran status, citizenship status, and genetic information.

Title: Digital Marketing Specialist (Real Estate) - Vancouver, BC - Indeed.com
Description:
Royal LePage Sussex Klein Group
is looking for a Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team.
(Contract or Full Time Options)
The ideal candidate for this position will have a passion for curating Digital Marketing campaigns and with an extensive understanding of the impact of marketing on Social Media channels (including but not limited to: Instagram, Facebook, Linkedin, YouTube).
About Us:
Klein Group has established itself as a high performance real estate company with a dynamic and team-driven approach to all aspects of client service and results. We thrive on continuing to stay innovative, professionally developing and committing to professionalism, all while maintaining a superior work/life balance.
We are #1 in Vancouver and #14 across Canada for Royal LePage among its 18,000 agents across Canada. With over $100B in real estate sales annually, Royal LePage remains the strongest real estate brand in Canada.
Areas of Excellence:
Energetic and professional personality, natural at developing relationships and working in a team environment.
Strong analytical and problem solving skills with solid knowledge of Social Media Channels, with in-depth knowledge of SEO and SEM marketing tactics.
Should be able to produce over a dozen times of content with understanding of creation and reaction of viral content
Able to schedule quarterly campaigns, administer a yearly calendar and deliver and track 3 to 5 postings per week on all channels.
Ability to produce great results independently and in a team environment, while understanding best practices and management of timelines.
Able to provide analysis, highlighting successes and recommendations for future considerations.
Lead and develop marketing strategies to drive traffic and brand awareness through digital marketing communications.
Duties to Include:
Provide strategic leadership and direction on all digital, web and social initiatives across core business segments.
Curating and managing digital marketing campaigns and content strategies, ensuring branding is applied.
Optimizing and developing regular reporting schedules on social media trends and opportunities, measuring impact of day-to-day strategy.
Creating and managing a monthly social media content calendar and marketing schedules for social platforms.
In-depth knowledge of SEO and SEM marketing tactics and best practices.
Continuously improving digital marketing channels and optimizing them to drive high quality traffic and leads through research based on media-related industry trends.
Analyzing the day-to-day content on our website to ensure that posts are relatable and relevant to each city and communicating to your team what should be posted on each channels.
Working with Marketing Department to develop and manage social media strategies aimed towards creating brand awareness and preference by direct engagement with our target audience.
Priorities:
Developing digital marketing campaigns with strategic use of digital and social media advertising, newsletters and other channels to drive qualified traffic and generate real estate leads.
Supporting the marketing department by assisting in the development in new content and ensure execution of cross-channel content strategy.
Enhancing the Brokerage’s image and reputation through effective branding and management of social media channel.
Schedule quarterly campaigns, administer a yearly calendar and deliver and track 3 to 5 postings per week on all channels.
Work collaboratively with various team members to ensure that branding is applied and effective.
Maintaining a network of key contacts, constantly growing a strong network – from a business development aspect but also from a marketing perspective.
Requirements:
Completion of Diploma or Certificate in Marketing, Communications or related creative field.
Minimum of 2+ years of experience in Digital Marketing, Branding and/or Advertising. Experience in the Real Estate is an asset.
Part-time hours: 25 per week
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Contract, Permanent
Salary: $24,646.00-$94,302.00 per year
Schedule:
On call

Title: Social Media Intern - Toronto, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
Social Media Intern
Stylefav
Stylefav is the next generation apparel e-commerce platform. Our approach to this competitive market is our focus in customer experience and a data driven technology.
We are STYLEFAV and we live on fashion! Our diverse, economically savvy and environmentally dedicated team are keen to make your shopping experience more personal and enjoyable. We take the time to research and handpick the trendy styles and pieces we know you want and the ones you didn’t know you needed. Our goal is to bring fashion that sparks our stylefavers joy, confidence and, inner beauty every time they open their closet.
Job Description:
We are seeking a Social Media Intern to manage the company's accounts on all social media platforms for visibility and engagement.
As the Social Media Intern, you will support the online voice of our brand ensuring the community is at the heart of everything we do. You will become an expert in brand storytelling and help us communicate our brand value through authentic engagement with clients, consumers, and followers alike. Throughout this experience, you should thrive not only on the responses and exposure you attract but building and connecting an enthusiastic community while representing our brand through our core values.
Job Responsibilities:
Assist team on social media strategy to increase Stylefav brand awareness, grow its followers and drive traffic to its website
Build, manage and maintain the company's social media presence on various platforms
Create new and innovative social media content that will attract prospective clients and followers
Participate in social media discussions and respond to comments on the company
Creative writing and content development for blogs and other postings.
Engage with key social influencers to form good relationships beneficial to grow the company brand
Attend industry and fashion online events or experiences to share on social. Become a part of the core creative team and assist in photoshoots and multimedia projects and PR.
Skills and Knowledge Requirements:
Strong knowledge of social media marketing strategies
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Ability to write clear and engaging social media content
Background in photography and graphic design skills is a bonus.
Up to date with the latest trends in social media
Good work ethic, hardworking and flexible
Must have eyes and a strong passion for fashion and technology.
Must have AI/ Graphic design experiences and savvy on design software.
Familiar with e-commerce space and digital online fashion platforms.
Strong understanding in business and fashion industry preferred.
We are looking for an individual who is committed to being a part of our team for the next 3 months - with the opportunity for a full-time position once internship is completed.
Please provide your social media handle and LinkedIn profile.
Job Types:
Internship with chance of full time after 3 months.
Volunteer Experience:
Social Media Management and social media content development: 2 years minimum
Location:
Remote, but needs to come in once a week to prepare social media content for the following week.
Internship Period:
Minimum 3 days/ 20 hours/ Week / 3 months
Kindly please visit our website www.stylefav.com and IG @ yourstyelfav to grasp your understanding prior to your application. All candidates must provide CV, Linkedin profile and social media handles, additional portfolio/ projects are welcome to send along.
Part-time hours: 20 per week
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Permanent
Salary: From $15.00 per hour

Store discount
Work from home

8 hour shift

Title: Marketing Manager - Toronto, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
We’re thrilled that you are interested in joining us here at the Amynta Group!
As the Marketing Manager, you will develop, execute, and monitor marketing programs for Sym-tech. Reporting directly to the VP, Product and Marketing, you will be the dedicated marketing support for the Sym-tech Dealer Services, based in Toronto. You are equally effective in managing day-to-day marketing initiatives, authoring original content and contributing to the overall creative process to support growth within all Sym-tech distribution channels.
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
Conceptualize and execute on multi-channel campaigns across the prospect and customer lifecycle, ensuring the alignment of communications and messaging across all channels
Establish positioning, identify target audiences, and develop marketing plans with specific objectives across different channels and segments
Work collaboratively with sales to manage sales campaigns and sales initiatives outside of key marketing initiatives
Project manage marketing projects with key Sym-tech internal stakeholders and shared service marketing resources
Evaluate and ensure all marketing materials follow the company or partner corporate brand standards, are updated with current information, and are in accordance with Advertising Standards Guidelines
Create communications, both internal and external, ensuring increased Sym-Tech brand awareness and extended reach including point-of-sale, digital media, web, CRM, presentation, editorial, video content and training materials related to Sym-Tech
Facilitate advertising, promotional and thought leaderships execution in line with campaigns and communicate strategy and approvals with Sym-tech executive team or partners
Full management of Sym-tech events and coordination/management of exhibitions. This includes but is not limited to tradeshows, partner conferences and general customer facing events.
Act as a focal point for new communications / content opportunities that arise and effectively prioritize activities to ensure timely delivery of previously committed initiatives
Work at a fast pace and employ effective time management skills to ensure timelines are met and internal requests are responded to in a timely manner
Monitor trade communications to identify industry trends that may impact / create opportunities for Sym-Tech
KNOWLEDGE & SKILLS REQUIRED
Writing and editing content for various channels and customer types
2 to 3 years job related experience
Experience writing and executing Creative Briefs and Marketing plans
Marketing analytics
Project management
Presentation and public speaking skills
Time management and organizational skills
Strong oral and written communication skills, including active listening and interpersonal skills
Going above and beyond attitude (strong work ethics).
Problem solving / conflict resolution and sound decision-making skills.
Experience developing marketing reports and conducting campaign analysis.
Ability to manage time efficiently
Ability to build relationships with colleagues at all levels within the organization
Experience with Microsoft Office (i.e., Excel, Word, Project, Outlook), Project Management tools (Smart Sheet, Project, etc.), Email tools (Pardot, HubSpot, Constant Contact etc.), Remote Collaboration tools (Slack, Teams, etc.).
University Degree
Bilingual preferred

Title: National Brand Marketing Leader - Associate Director - Toronto, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.
The opportunity
EY has a powerful brand story to tell. Now, we’re seeking a strategic and innovative National Brand Marketing Leader – Associate Director who will combine proven modern marketing capabilities with deep brand experience to raise the bar on our brand direction, deliver transformative brand programs that significantly grow our share of voice, and engage internal and external audiences in distinctive and creative ways to capture the hearts and minds of audiences.
This newly created role is designed for a visionary brand leader who is passionate about breaking down barriers in pursuit of limitless opportunities to build bigger, bolder, better brand and marketing campaigns, while driving business impact. The successful candidate will have a challenger mindset, innate curiosity and a natural drive to overcome the status quo.
Reporting to EY Canada’s Head of Brand, Marketing & Communications (BMC), you will play a senior leadership role and support a team of about 15 seasoned marketing professionals. Equal parts strategist and expert doer, you will go beyond employing foundational brand strategies to increase market visibility through new ideas, a long-term focus, compelling storytelling and best-in-class omnichannel execution.
That means inspiring and uniting a cross-functional team, working across the BMC group and with executive stakeholders to build, implement, measure and evolve data-backed brand go-to-market strategies across:
Employer brand
Signature brand awareness campaigns
Entrepreneurship ecosystem programs
Corporate responsibility initiatives
Sponsorships
Events and people engagement
By leveraging martech, digital and social media, insights and unique human stories, you will lead this team in opening up new conversations, supporting business goals, reaching desired target audiences and spurring long-term organizational growth.
Your key responsibilities:
Design, execute and measure transformational brand strategies and programs often from the ground up, in direct alignment with our overarching brand, marketing and communications plan.
Own the creative direction of internal and external branding efforts in Canada to connect cross-channel programs and initiatives with bold messaging, and flare.
Assess and evaluate Americas and Global brand initiatives to inform and broaden the Canadian approach, and strategically leverage or complement with localized campaigns, creative, content and media plans.
Carefully manage and oversee all aspects of brand team processes and deliverables, linking planning, message and campaign development, media selection, content creation, stakeholder socialization, budget management, and results tracking to ensure excellence and optimal impact.
Partner with external agencies to develop showstopping campaigns and programs that integrate media, creative, digital, social, content and sponsorships to raise awareness, drive education, support engagement and inspire action.
Work collaboratively with internal marketing strategy, channels and demand generation teams to deliver coordinated and relevant go-to-market initiatives and performance.
Connect with key stakeholders across the business, including Talent, executive leadership, service lines, solutions and sectors, to understand their priorities, develop strategic brand plans to achieve goals, manage approvals and oversee implementation of cross-channel programs and initiatives.
Run and manage brand surveys and brand lift studies to assess effectiveness and identify gaps and opportunities that are fed back to the business.
Lead, manage and empower a team that assumes portfolio ownership, innovates and operates with excellence in mind, and impeccable attention to detail.
Skills and attributes for success:
Demonstrated brand/marketing leadership experience with a large, matrixed, fast-paced and complex B2B organization.
Proven track-record with rich, hands-on brand and marketing experience developing and managing brand strategy, campaigns, content and digital marketing across channels and formats.
Seasoned brand marketer who leverages futurist thinking to develop programs and breakthrough creative that sets organizations apart in the market.
Invested leader, committed to coaching, mentoring and guiding multi-layered teams.
Articulate and influential relationship builder who manages stakeholder groups proactively (including C-Suite, senior leadership, teams and external vendors).
Natural self-starter and curious problem-solver who drives ideation and innovation with a solution-oriented focus. No issue is too big.
Organized, data-driven strategist who uses metrics and voice of the customer insights to identify white space, inform improvements, and evolve initiatives accordingly.
Excellent and effective communicator who listens, writes, edits and presents exceptionally well.
Committed to cultivating diverse perspectives and an inclusive culture to drive better decisions, stimulate innovation, improve organizational agility and strengthen resilience.
To qualify for the role, you must have:
Bachelor's degree in marketing, digital marketing, or communications; MBA preferred.
15+ years B2B marketing experience in a fast-paced, dynamic work environment; agency experience is a strong asset.
5-7 years in progressive leadership roles managing direct teams, multiple priorities, large initiatives and critical deadlines.
Proven brand expertise and a passion for building brand strategies and programs, internally and externally, from the ground up.
Ideally, you’ll also have
Media experience
What we offer
We offer a competitive compensation package where you’ll be rewarded based on your performance and recognized for the value you bring to our business. In addition, our Total Rewards package allows you decide which benefits are right for you and which ones help you create a solid foundation for your future. Our Total Rewards package includes a comprehensive medical, prescription drug and dental coverage, a defined contribution pension plan, a great vacation policy plus firm paid days that allow you to enjoy longer long weekends throughout the year, statutory holidays and paid personal days (based on province of residence), and a range of exciting programs and benefits designed to support your physical, financial and social well-being. Plus, we offer:
Support and coaching from some of the most engaging colleagues in the industry
Learning opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career
The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you
Diversity and Inclusion at EY
Diversity and inclusiveness are at the heart of who we are and how we work. We’re committed to fostering an environment where differences are valued, policies and practices are equitable, and our people feel a sense of belonging. From our actions to combat systemic racism and our advocacy for the LGBT+ community to our innovative Neurodiversity Centre of Excellence and Accessibility initiatives, we welcome and embrace the diverse experiences, abilities, backgrounds and perspectives that make our people unique and help guide us. Because when people feel free to be their authentic selves at work, they bring their best and are empowered to build a better working world.
If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.
The exceptional EY experience. It’s yours to build.
EY | Building a better working world
EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.
Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.
Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

Title: Content Marketing Specialist - Montréal, QC - Indeed.com
Description:
Content Marketing Specialist
Equisoft, a leading global provider of digital business solutions for the insurance and wealth industries, is actively seeking new talent!
The Content Marketing Specialist, reports to the Director, Marketing & Communications and works closely with our local and international divisions. The candidate will focus on content creation, optimization, distribution and data analysis. In this role, the individual will produce a wide variety of short form content across various channels that support brand awareness, lead generation, SEO and other marketing efforts.
If you have a passion for storytelling, a love for words, enjoy writing for a variety of media, are a team player and a person who is looking to grow within a dynamic international context, please send us your resume!
CORE RESPONSIBILITIES
Brand Awareness:
Write unique, compelling marketing and thought leadership content for the website, such as blog posts, website page content, social media campaigns, brochures, presentations, and video scripts.
Work with the content lead to repurpose long form pieces and develop new ones
Liaise with internal SMEs and external experts to research stories as needed
Lead Generation:
Support the Growth Marketing team and create effective and compelling lead magnets
Develop digital copy to be used across a range of digital marketing deliverables including landing pages, display, SEO content, paid social and paid search.
Produce the core B2B copy that will increase a prospect's likelihood of progressing through the marketing funnel
SEO:
Proactively implement SEO best practices to maximize online visibility in search results, including conducting keyword research, following SEO writing best practices, readability scoring, and internal linking. Create content to support SEO initiatives and assist with strategic SEO writing/updates.
Regularly monitor content metrics and suggest ways to improve.
Participate and pitch topics for new content ideas at editorial meetings for content planning and calendar-building.
Other tasks:
Collaborate with graphic designers to produce supporting visuals and infographics.
Provide content writing support for special campaigns to build brand awareness and increase engagement.
MUST-HAVES
The ideal candidate has 4-5 years of experience in a high growth tech environment (start-up or mid-size B2B technology company preferred).
Writing:
You’re as comfortable writing marketing copy as thought leadership content and knows how to hook readers.
Repurposing:
You know how to stretch a piece of content to get as many assets and uses out of it as possible.
Project management:
You’re extremely organized with a record of using Asana (huge plus) or other project management tools, and have rarely missed a deadline.
SEO:
You have experience working with SEO keyword tools such as SEMrush, Moz or Ahrefs is an asset
Data Driven:
You know how to measure content effectiveness, have used Google Analytics and other platforms
Learner:
You are part of content/marketing communities, have a thirst for knowledge, and are always current with trends in digital marketing, including tools and measurement
Digital savvy:
You are super comfortable with CMS, CRM, and have a good understanding of CTR, CPC, CAC and others
Proven record:
You have built content, stories, that delivered results whether it is conversions, pipeline or most importantly supported brand awareness and thought leadership
Language:
Excellent written and verbal skills in English
NICE-TO-HAVES
Experience in Financial Services, understanding of the Insurance or Wealth management verticals
Knowledge of French and/or Spanish
YOUR BENEFITS
Competitive compensation package
Comprehensive employee benefits
Flexible hours and collaborative working spaces
Career development opportunities
We thank you for your interest in our company and we guarantee that all submitted applications will be considered.
Only those whose applications are selected will be contacted for interview purposes. By submitting your application, you consent to Equisoft collecting, using & storing your personal data in order to apply for a job and for Equisoft to analyze your application. Due to the nature of its products and services, Equisoft will perform thorough background checks prior to confirming one’s employment.

Title: Digital Project Manager - Toronto, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
HELLO!
We are looking for an Intermediate Digital Project Manager who is as strategic as they are analytical, whose primary purpose is to manage and deliver mid-to-large scale projects that include strategy, design, development, performance, digital marketing and production.
WHO WE ARE:
We are Art & Science (A&S), and we are a team of creative technologists who don’t see art and science as two separate things. We have a ten-year history of creating digital experiences for some of the biggest brands in Canada, launching new brands designed from the ground up, and helping new businesses get off the ground with proven customer-centric strategies.
INCLUSIVITY AND ACCESSIBILITY
Art & Science is an inclusive, diverse and accessible work environment. We strongly encourage applications from women, racialized people, Indigenous peoples, people from gender-diverse and sexually-diverse communities, people with disabilities (visible or non-visible), people of different religious backgrounds, people with family caregiving responsibilities and/or people with intersectional identities. Art & Science will provide accommodations to job applicants throughout the recruitment process. If you require an accommodation, please notify us and we will work with you to meet your needs.
YOUR ROLE
From brief to delivery, Project Managers are at the heart of all of our projects.
As an Intermediate Digital Project Manager (DPM) at A&S, you are encouraged to drive/facilitate key project decisions, while collaborating with and informing discipline leads as needed. You will be responsible for all day-to-day project activities including managing internal and external teams and all stakeholder communications. You are also responsible for the financial reporting and resource management of all projects you manage. As a DPM, you are coming to A&S with agency experience and a strong understanding of digital projects. You are responsible for managing and delivering mid scale projects that include strategy, design, development, performance/ digital marketing and production. You are responsible for the overall project health and quality of delivery, working closely with account and discipline leads to ensure high quality projects are delivered on time and on budget, while always meeting the strategic business and marketing goals of our clients.
WHAT YOU’LL DO:
Manage all aspects of the digital web and/or marketing project from brief to delivery, including; strategy, creative, development, production, social media and performance marketing.
Actively assess, flag and work with senior leads to calculate risk and solve crisis management issues, to ensure the profitable delivery of project work.
Partner with Account Manager/Lead and discipline leads to manage client services by:
Being responsible for estimates, statements of work, change orders, contracts, resourcing based on the project scope and desired margin.
Focusing on project goals (both large and small) that optimize process and approach, while finding opportunities to better service the project/client.
Producing and maintaining top standard documentation (and corresponding communication cadences) including financial reports, status/burn reports, asset management, invoicing, and lessons learned (retrospectives).
Continuously set and manage expectations with all stakeholders (internal, client, and vendor) to ensure alignment and compliance on project and account level decisions.
Actively partner with discipline leads to guide and manage the evolution of project work from brief to delivery, ensuring top level quality throughout the project lifecycle.
Proactively plan and implement all resourcing needs throughout the project lifecycle.
Practice solution oriented thinking and problem solving by:
Having a high degree of empathy and applying that lens to each situation
Remaining positive, resilient, and retaining a professional demeanour with all stakeholders (clients, internal teams, vendors, etc).
Participate and contribute in departmental meetings, adding to the project management culture of driving efficiency and quality
WHAT YOU KNOW:
You enjoy driving process; always keeping efficiency in mind for both projects teams and delivery.
You have a good understanding (backed by multiple years of experience) managing campaign and web deliverables including; website development, digital/performance marketing, and production.
You understand delivery approaches across different project types, and can create project plans accordingly.
You are well versed in project management methodologies and approaches, including but not limited to Waterfall, Agile, Hybrid, etc, and understand when to tailor/pivot the process to fit the parameters of a project/client.
You have experience/familiarity working in Google Drive, JIRA, Trello and SmartSheet.
Your management of clients and project teams is based on empathy; you are able to motivate, support and understand the teams and stakeholders you are overseeing.
You have an innate ability to lead by example; collaborating with and managing project teams, and actively participating in departmental conversations.
You are someone who takes an active interest in building and fostering great relationships with the people you work with; both at A&S and our clients.
WHY WORK WITH US:
This is your opportunity to join an agency with a heart, where the values of Diversity and Equity are a focus throughout the organization.
In addition to a competitive compensation package, which includes a base salary of $60,000 - 65,000 CAD and a comprehensive health benefits plan, you will start with three weeks vacation, additional time off near summer long weekends and winter holidays.
We have an office downtown Toronto for those that prefer to work from the office, however we will be moving to working remotely and we plan to continue that practice into the future. We have core business hours 9-5 EST where we expect you to be online and able to communicate with the team/clients.
You will also experience generous leave programs, so you’re not using vacation if you’re sick and/or need to care for others. We have a downtown office, with the desire to have people working out of the office on a flexible basis once it is possible to do so. You will have the opportunity to shape the performance marketing team, and the careers of the people on it. Our team is one with a strong sense of camaraderie, where everyone wants to see one another succeed. If this piques your interest, we look forward to receiving your application.
HOW TO APPLY• Interested candidates are asked to fill out the job application form for Digital Project Manager in our job portal.
In the job application form, you will be asked to provide the following information:
Personal Contact Details (Name, Email, Phone, Pronoun(s))
Resume
[APPLY NOW] (https://secure.collage.co/jobs/art-science/25311)
Our hiring manager takes time to review these applications. The level of effort you put into this application process is taken into consideration when assessing candidates to move into the next round.
Art & Science is an equal opportunity employer. ​We will provide accommodations to job applicants throughout the recruitment process. If you require an accommodation, please notify us and we will work with you to meet your needs.

Title: Marketing Analyst - Calgary, AB - Indeed.com
Description:
We are currently looking to hire a high energy junior Marketing Analyst who will work closely with the Product Lead to launch an exciting new social media chat app in a new startup.
This is a great opportunity to apply your full range of marketing skill and knowledge to an interesting project.
The successful candidate will:
-Plan marketing campaigns and promotions
-Manage the corporate social media accounts
-Reach out and communicate with press, media, groups, influencers, etc
-Design interesting graphics, sounds, videos to promote the app.
Job requirements:
-Self starter a must
-Don’t have to know everything, but ready to learn everything needed to achieve objectives
-Experience as a creator on major social media platforms a requirement
-Experience with creating digital media content including graphics, sound, videos a requirement
-Experience with major graphical design software such as Adobe Aftereffects, Premier Pro, Illustrator , Figma a requirement
-Experienced with workpress, canva, wix a plus
-Graduate from a formal marketing/ graphic design education a plus
-3-5 years of experience a plus
Reference ID: PRO-0031
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: $30,000.00-$50,000.00 per year
Benefits:
Stock options
Schedule:
8 hour shift
Monday to Friday
Work remotely:
Yes
